next_steps.note: Brainstorm 3-5 potential themes or subjects for the poetry (e.g., nature, loss, hope, city life). Add these to 'Ideas'.
Draft a short free verse poem (8-12 lines) exploring one of the brainstormed themes. Add this to 'Progress' as 'Draft 1'.
Research 2-3 poets known for similar themes or styles. Note down key techniques they use. Add to 'Ideas' as 'Inspiration/Techniques'.
Identify 1-2 specific poetic devices (e.g., metaphor, alliteration, imagery) to intentionally incorporate into a revised draft. Add to 'Ideas' as 'Techniques to Implement'.
Review 'Draft 1' and revise it, focusing on incorporating the identified poetic devices and improving flow/imagery.  Update 'Progress' with 'Draft 2'.
